title: Apple Inc. stock underperforms Friday when compared to competitors
text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -0.32%
       slumped 0.84% to $182.31 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        +0.52%
       falling 0.82% to 15,775.65 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.02%
       falling 0.37% to 38,627.99. This was the stock's fifth consecutive day of losses. Apple Inc. closed $17.31 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company achieved on December 14th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        +0.38%
       fell 0.61% to $404.06, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.43%
       fell 1.51% to $141.76, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.47%
       fell 1.58% to $140.52. Trading volume (48.3 M) remained 7.7 million below its 50-day average volume of 56.0 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The chip maker's shares were wavering after a report of rivals teaming up to undercut Nvidia's dominance in AI chips.
